title: PS5 Confirmations, Rumors, and Spoilers - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.03.20
description:
Tamoor Hussain from GameSpot FINALLY joins Tim to go through a whole bunch of PlayStation 5 tidbits, Xbox being crazy fast, Activision making hella money, and more!

Follow Tamoor here: https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:40 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is happening. This Saturday starting at 10am pacific time you can catch the whole Kinda Funny crew and our shenanigans for 12 hours straight as we’ll be raising money for the Children’s Miracle Network of hospitals. Catch it all going down live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
and also community stream hosting starts friday @ 1pm pt
And remember you can go to kindafunny.com/extralife to join the team and/or donate
If you can’t tell, it’s a busy week at Kinda Funny. So because of the way scheduling is shaking out, PS I Love You XOXO will be posting Friday this week as opposed to Tuesday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:04:12 -  Gran Turismo 7 Reportedly Aiming to Launch in First Half of 2021(Jordan Oloman IGN)
00:10:25 - Ratchet And Clank: Rift Apart Is Only Coming To PS5, Insomniac Confirms (allesandro at Gamespot)
00:13:00 - Insomniac Warns of Miles Morales Spoilers 
00:16:00 - Sony Confirms to GamePro the HDMI Cable with the PS5 is the right One
00:22:20 - PS5 DualSense Teardown Reveals How Sophisticated The Adaptive Triggers Really Are (Darryn Bonthuys at Gamespot)
00:27:06 - Do you expect this support from 3rd parties to keep going throughout the generation, or are adaptive triggers just a gimmick that’s going to be used with early games and dropped quickly?  - Best Friends Q:Ignacio Rojas
00:30:40 - Is it time to let the Apes escape? - Best Friends Q:The Big Katt
00:33:55 - The Witcher 3 On Xbox Series X Has No Load Screens For Fast Travel (James O’Connor at GameSpot)
00:36:30 -  Ad  
00:40:00 -Activision Blizzard Made $1.2 Billion From Microtransactions In Just Three Months(Eddie Makuch at GameSpot)
00:44:15 - Call of Duty: Warzone Won't Shift Engine, Even Though Black Ops Cold War Has (Jordan Oloman IGN)
00:47:40 - Pokémon Go has surpassed $4bn in lifetime revenue (Daniel Ahmad’s Twitter)
00:50:30 - Friday the 13th killing dedicated servers (from Friday the 13th The Game’s Forum)
00:54:10 - Out today
00:56:00 - Squad Up:Mizukey(https://www.extra-life.org/participant/atm AND/OR twitch.tv/kingkaiser)
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
